column3: What would you like to do?
Seems every other day we stop dealing in this or that type of tomestone. Inevitably, there comes a point when Rowena says that they're not worth the hassle anymore.
Might be as I still have use for them, though. If you have any you don't need, bring them here and I'll give you something more desirable in exchange.
Might be as I still have use for them, though. If you have any you don't need, I'll give you something more desirable in exchange.
Oh? Looks like your hands are pretty full already.
